sentences.sContent: With this candle, I will light your way in darkness.
sentences.sContent_eng: With this candle, I will light your way in darkness.
sentences.sCn: 用这蜡烛，我会在黑暗中照亮你的生命。

sentences.sContent: With this candle, I will light your way into darkness.
sentences.sContent_eng: With this candle, I will light your way into darkness.
sentences.sCn: 用这蜡烛，我将在黑暗中照亮你的路途；

sentences.sContent: The birthday candle in a season of flowers, each one is my wish. Happy birthday!
sentences.sContent_eng: The birthday candle in a season of flowers, each one is my wish. Happy birthday!
sentences.sCn: 生日的烛光中摇曳一季繁花，每一支都是我的祝愿。生日快乐！

phrases.pCn: [常用于否定句或疑问句]值得，合算，划得来
n. [物理]烛光（国际单位制中的照明单位）

trans.tranOther: a stick of  wax  with a string through the middle, which you burn to give light
